mng: to cover, to shield, to screen, to conceal

exm.mng: to cover, to hide from view, to obstruct or block, defilade (military)
to conceal, to hide, covert, under cover
to screen, to block (sth or sb), to shield, (protective) shield
one word says it all (idiom, from Analects); to cut a long story short, in a nutshell
lit. hiding the sky and covering the earth (idiom); fig. earth-shattering, omnipresent, of universal importance
